abstract: AMC Entertainment, Kansas City, Mo., chose as its agencies of record two that are owned by the Omnicom Group.
snippet: AMC Entertainment, Kansas City, Mo., chose as its agencies of record two that are owned by the Omnicom Group.
lead_paragraph: AMC Entertainment, Kansas City, Mo., chose as its agencies of record two that are owned by the Omnicom Group. Signal to Noise, San Francisco, will handle digital marketing, and Rapp, New York, will handle direct marketing and customer relationship marketing. There had been no previous agencies and billings were not disclosed. The assignment is the first for Signal to Noise since it was renamed; it had previously been the San Francisco office of Agency.com.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry
